description: The initiative, known as Gronne Nabofaellesskaber or Green Neighborhood Communities, is a nationwide organization in Denmark focused on fostering sustainable values through community engagement. Founded in 2020, it has grown to encompass around 310 local groups and 3,500 members. The organization promotes various activities, such as communal cooking and gardening, to activate local communities and encourage sustainable living. Its grassroots approach relies on passionate local representatives to drive engagement and collaboration with municipalities and other stakeholders.
name: Gronne Nabofaellesskaber
